src:
Hasil Balap F1 Austin: Bottas Menang, Hamilton Kunci Gelar Keenam
04 Nov 2019, 03:59 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Pebalap Mercedes AMG Petronas, Valtteri Bottas, sukses meraih kemenangan dalam Formula 1 GP Austin, Texas, Amerika Serikat, yang digelar di Circuit of The Americas, Minggu (3/11/2019) waktu setempat.
Pebalap Finlandia ini diikuti oleh sang tandem, Lewis Hamilton, di posisi kedua, dan pebalap Aston Martin Red Bull Racing Honda, Max Verstappen, di posisi ketiga.
Dengan hasil ini, Hamilton pun sukses mengunci gelar dunianya yang keenam sejak turun di F1 pada 2007 lalu. Ia pun mematahkan rekor Juan Manuel Fangio, dan hanya tertinggal satu gelar lagi dari Michael Schumacher.
Sementara itu posisi keempat dan kelima masing-masing ditempati oleh pebalap Scuderia Ferrari, Charles Leclerc, dan pebalap Renault F1 Team, Daniel Ricciardo.
Berikut hasil balap F1 GP Austin 2019.
text:
Austin F1 Racing Results: Bottas Wins, Hamilton Key to the Sixth Title
Nov 04 2019, 03:59 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Mercedes AMG Petronas driver, Valtteri Bottas, successfully won the Formula 1 GP in Austin, Texas, United States, which was held at the Circuit of The Americas, Sunday (3/11/2019) local time.
The Finn was followed by the tandem, Lewis Hamilton, in second place, and Aston Martin Red Bull Racing Honda driver Max Verstappen, in third position.
With this result, Hamilton also successfully locked his sixth world title since going down in F1 in 2007. He also broke Juan Manuel Fangio's record, and was left with only one more degree from Michael Schumacher.
Meanwhile the fourth and fifth positions were each occupied by the Scuderia Ferrari driver, Charles Leclerc, and the Renault F1 Team racer, Daniel Ricciardo.
Here are the results of the 2019 GP F1 Austin racing.
